text: Theodore Payne Thurston (June 30, 1867 - January 28, 1941) was the second diocesan bishop of Oklahoma in the Episcopal Church. Prior to his consecration as bishop, he served as rector of St. Paul's Church in Owatonna, Minnesota; St. Paul's Church in Winona, Minnesota; and St. Paul's Church in Minneapolis, Minnesota. ==References== Category:1867 births Category:1941 deaths Category:Bishops of the Episcopal Church in the United States of America Category:People from Delavan, Illinois Category:People from Owatonna, Minnesota Category:People from Winona, Minnesota Category:People from Minneapolis
title: Theodore Payne Thurston
